page.title: 18A RAMPTON VILLAGE FAMILY
page.content: Hello! My name is Jaya Naghen and I go to Rampton Primary School. I live on the Pastures Estate in Rampton Village. It is an estate of modern houses and bungalows which was bought off the builders by Rampton Hospital for their employees. We are lucky to own our house. My Dad works at Rampton Hospital as a Tutor Nurse. He comes from a country near Africa called Mauritius. I have been there once but it was when I was a baby.My Mum goes to work and she is a teacher at an Adult Training Centre for the mentally handicapped in Worksop. We own two cars and a caravan which we use to go on holiday in.I have one sister who goes to the secondary school in Retford, and a brother who is younger than me and goes to Rampton School.
